means.word_mean: 1. (voodooism) a spirit or supernatural force that reanimates a dead body
2. a god of voodoo cults of African origin worshipped especially in West Indies
3. a dead body that has been brought back to life by a supernatural force
4. someone who acts or responds in a mechanical or apathetic way;
5. several kinds of rum with fruit juice and usually apricot liqueur
